attributes.description:
The legendary "CITIGOLF". A South African favorite known for its reliably, easy maintenance and fuel efficiency. This 1994 CITI Golf starts on the first kick and still drives well. The interior is still in its original condition. It also has the original backboard, steering wheel, OEM Hella headlamps, a crack-free dashboard, original owners manual, service book, logbook, and original VW road map. To make your journey more memorable, a front-loader radio with AUX input, USB input, and SD card slot has been fitted.

For more information, contact 0835091700 or 0728242534
